data.event: “I’ve really missed sitting at that part of the table and interfacing with people, with business owners, on the one-on-one basis,” Bellah said Monday when asked why he wanted to run for village president again.

event.title: the past four years and said

data.event: Becker has been president for the past four years and said he wants to continue doing a job he enjoys.
“In the years I’ve been on the village board, residents know they can come to me with a problem and I will try to get to the bottom of it,” Bellah said.
